title: How does one become a Master of Evil? - Quora

response.answer_text: You choose to harm others physically and mentally and get away with it. No master of Evil has live a happy long life ..... people with integrity from all walks of life will fight to eradicate Evil .... from the time man walked on this planet evil existed but good always prevailed and will continue to prevail.
If you have to ask you will never know.Now repent, you’re probably a really good, albeit confused, person.
